title: Whose Eggs Are These?
description: While reading descriptions of different eggs, students are encouraged to guess the types of eggs in Whose Eggs Are These? After reading each description, students can find the answer on the following page.
meta: butterfly, case, feathers, frog, pearls, penguin, robin, shark, silk, spider, spiny, tadpoles, twigs
Connect to prior knowledge to understand the text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main details
Manipulate Initial Sound : Manipulate initial sounds
Adjectives : Identify and understand adjectives in text
High-Frequency Words : Recognize, write, and understand the use of high-frequency words this and these

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
